creditCard.title: Credit Card Information
creditCard.message: Please enter in your credit card information to be used for your reservation.

errors.cardNumber: Enter a full credit card number.
errors.name: Enter the name printed on the credit card.
errors.expMonth: Enter the credit card expiry month.
errors.expYear: Enter the credit card expiry year.
errors.cvv: Enter the PIN on the back of the credit card.

licenseUpload.title: Driver's License
licenseUpload.message: Upload front and back images of your driver's license.

goBack.title: Are you sure?
goBack.message: Going back will discard the added files.

frontImage.title: Front Image
frontImage.drag: Drag and drop the front image here
frontImage.notSelected: You must select the front image.

backImage.title: Back Image
backImage.drag: Drag and drop the back image here
backImage.notSelected: You must select the back image.

rentalSignature.title: Booking Signature
rentalSignature.message: Draw your signature below and press the Save button.
rentalSignature.message_agreement: Draw your signature below and press the Save button.
rentalSignature.signatureRequired: Add your signature and press the Save button before you continue.

goBack.title: Are you sure?
goBack.message: Going back will discard the added signature.

errorBoundary.title: Uh Oh
errorBoundary.message: There was a fatal error in the application.

successSubmission.title: Success!
successSubmission.message: Thank you for submitting your information towards the booking.
successSubmission.message_agreement: Thank you for submitting your information towards the rental contract.

authenticationSubmission.title: Authenticating
authenticationSubmission.message: We had trouble authenticating this connection.

coreDetailsFetchError.title: Uh Oh
coreDetailsFetchError.message: We could not locate the reservation.
coreDetailsFetchError.message_agreement: We could not locate the rental contract.

badSubmission.title: Uh Oh
badSubmission.message: I encountered an error when trying to submit your information.

queryMissing.title: Uh Oh
queryMissing.message: It looks like all not all the necessary information was sent.
